review: All good except a place for a better sitting arrangement will be nice, because we have to stand for long waiting. She is very much wanted by many.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had met 4 doctors before finally meeting Dr. Shakuntla Kumar. The difference is when I visited other doctors they talked sweetly, gave a high level description of the whole issue and recommended umpteen tests from the diagnostic center of their choice and finally the money they will charge for the process with no upper ceiling to the amount and create a sense of urgency, BUT when I met Dr. Shakuntla she did not ask for any report/test, instead did the first hand diagnosis herself, explained the issue patiently in detail and in a way that sounded compassionate for ignorant people (like us) explained why what is suggesting is the best option. We were convinced without an ounce of doubt. Oh yes, fees! She didn't say a word about it. Fees was reasonable for the process but care and professionalism was what convinced us. She doesn't see a patient as ATM but as a human being and gives every person the due respect and care they deserve. She is a perfect person for the nature of her work. Respect for her!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Since this was our first child, we were unaware of what we were getting into. Dr. Shakuntla constantly reassured me by giving my husband and me detailed education of what was happening both to my body and emotions. Every step of the way, we knew we were in good hands. 
She made herself very approachable and available to me. Her passionate way of interacting with her patients made us become very faithful in her approach. She is compassionate, thoughtful, dedicated to providing the best patient care.The months leading up to the big day were full of questions and concerns, but were handled so well by her.Her calm demeanor and positive aura helped create a tranquil environment during this once in a lifetime event.

I will always be grateful for the excellent care provided by  Dr. Shakuntla, Dr. Harish, Dr. Abdul, Dr. Irfan and Dr. Surabhi Gupta, pediatrician.
 Special Thanks to Ms.Sonalika, Dr.Shakuntla's coordinator for timely scheduling all my doctor's visit and hassle-free billings.
From a stress free delivery to a perfect, quick healing circumcision, the C-section way a great stress free experience here. Ingrid made me feel calm and relaxed the whole time.

Your attention and all of your hospital staff has always been excellent! God bless you abundantly.

Thank you for making this experience a wonderful one! :) 

With love n regards 
Heena & Prateek Jain

Even though I booked my appointment about 2 days back, I had to wait for more than 2.5 hours. I reached the hospital on time for my appointment but they still made me wait for so long. I kept asking the receptionist and she kept assuring me that they will send me next but still they made me wait for more than 2.5 hours. They said that some meeting was going on which is very unprofessional in my opinion. If a slot is not available or if they are not sending in patients according to their appointment timings, they shouldn’t take appointments. I had some prior engagements which I had to cancel because of such a long waiting period. The most annoying part is that this hasn’t happened for the first time. The last time I booked an appointment through Practo and went to see the same doctor in Nulife Hospital, I had to wait for about 3 hours. I thought it was a one time thing, but this is unacceptable, it’s like they don’t value our time at all. Another point I would like to highlight is that the hospital is under construction and it is very dusty, sitting on the same chair for almost 3 hours while the dust keeps flying in the same area is really irritating. The doctor was nice and patiently diagnosed me, but I would not recommend this hospital at all.

Doctor was late hence they pushed everyone's appointment. However they didn't inform this to anyone, the reason they have was, internet was not working hence we were not able to check online appointments. We reached on time but had to wait for an hour as doctor was late and she was attending previous offline appointments. When an appointment is made via apps like this and still you have to wait for an hour, what is the relevance of making an appointment in advance then? Even after Practos call centre executive requested the receptionist to make some room for our requirement, we still had to wait. After an hour we( me and my husband) met with doctor and explained her of the issue and pain I was experiencing. She started examinimg me but instead of explaining/asking/informing anything she directly said there is abscess formed and we have to operate it. I said its already oozing out so what's the need of incision and if antibiotics can help she denied straight away. I asked what is the cause of the issue, why did it occurred at first place, she said I don't know. I mean you are a doctor you have to let us know what is the probable cause, I didn't spent 500 Rs. On a highly qualified doctor just to get the abscess removed. On top of that we were to get the operation done in the morning and it would take 15000 Rs.. 15k to get the abscess drained out. Horrible Horrible experience

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
So a little background..I've been diagnosed with PCOD earlier this year and even the Ultrasound tests all confirm it so. 
I shifted to Delhi some weeks back and wanted to check my current situation. After all the prior tests and meetings I was referred to her. So, I waited for about 2hrs and when it was my turn, she just viewed my results and completely invalidated my condition and said I just need to lose weight. ****** * **** ** ******* *** *********** ** **** ******* I don't recommend this doctor to anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I have admitted this hospital due to some heart issues. I was glad that I took this decision otherwise I wouldn't be here. I was undergoing the treatment under Dr. Akshay. I must say that he is the most wonderful Doctor I have seen. He was very affectionate and courteous towards me and my family. He not only explained me well about my health issues but also assure me about each and everything in advance.Also special thanks to Dr. Shakuntala, she has an enviable standard of proficiency in her field, she also helped me lot during my stay in hospital. Me and my family are their old patients, and also refer this hospital to our friends and relatives. I am also grateful to Anju didi who refered me to them in first place.  All of their staff was also very nice and helpful .

For starters she is extremely reasonable compared to other senior gynecologists that I have referred in the past yet much better than them. She is a very good academician and speaker which really impresses me - a power packed personality indeed!
What I really love about her is the way she handles any patient. She is never in a hurry to finish of her consultation with any patient even her OPD is jam packed. I have been consulting her since 5 years and I know its rare to find such humble doctors.the best doc Acc to me :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: This is my first meet with her today only. she is very positive,a good listener and understanding which cures half of the illness of the patient,which in my case also happened.but I cannot comment on the treatment as for that I have to wait and watch the effects of her medication,which most likely will be good enough as she is a very experienced doctor.even the staff is very warm unlike other clinics.

visited her with my relative four five times. analyzing my visits,  I Can say this doctor  doesn't hear patient patiently. Most of all, I didn't like, *** ****** ******* ** *********** ********* ***** *** if patient comes with these tests done from any other laboratory she doesn't accept and want patient to get the test done her laboratory.
All good except a place for a better sitting arrangement will be nice, because we have to stand for long waiting. She is very much wanted by many.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have being there for last 3 years and i feel very comfartable here ..my both of child born here ...mam thanks a lot to being my doctor and treat us as a family member ...trust me there is no any doctor in all delhi like  shakuntala mam ...it was the best decision of my life to continue the pregnancy of my wife with shakuntala mam and now we have a cute boy kid  born on 13 june i feel so happy ....big problem is treated in a great way ..she is always available at any time during emergency ..I strongly recommend shakuntala mam to everyone .. i think nuilife hospital is best for everyone ...reception is also doing there job very well specially ( soniya and sonali )

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Doctor was very kind. He listened to the problem patiently and checked properly. Medicines recommended by the doctor were very helpful.I am very satisfied.Thnks for shakuntla kumar Ma'am she is very supportive and all staff members very professional and active staff. Responsive and involved in their duties. Took care of my child periodically till she got discharged **** ****** Doctors give your call proper time that is required to solve your queries. Reception people are so easy to communicate with,special mention to Ms. Kamla Ma'am and soniya Ma'am.Facilities are appreciable
Regrds and thnks-
Pooja mishra choudhary

My experience is NOT quite satisfactory...    About Dr professionalism, She listen to their patients problems but as far as their staff role is concerned, they never manage to convey msgs to Dr nor even pick my calls then what is the use of giving coordinators numbers to patients.I eagerly wanted to talk to Dr shakuntala but couldnt connect coz we are not allowed to get direct number of Dr. i spent huge amount on Scans *** ** *** *** *** ** ****** *** ** lack of communication gap .its better to consult Clinic instead of hospital  where Dr is available to talk directly to their patients..   Totally disappointed.

I  booked the appointment with Dr Shakuntala however when i reached there, the doctor was not available from past 2 days. Not sure why at the first place the appointment was confirmed. The staff asked me to meet another doctor.  Im not at all satisfied with her. I desperately wanted to meet doctor Shakuntala for counselling as lot of people recommended the doctor to me as my baby was still born due to placental abruption (somewhere else).  I booked the Appointment few couple of days ago.  I came 50kms away from the doctors clinic but  doctor was not available.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very courteous, very professional, she is amazing.I had an terrible issue last night, i was very much worried, i have heard about her and have been to her clinic before with someone else 3 years back,i was very much influenced by her positive attittude, way of handling the patient is quite admirable, I called her clinic , her assistant understand the issue and pass on my message to dr. Shakuntala, And even though I was not her patient she still share some advise and today morning I visited her and she did the check up and explained the issue to me and very much satisfied, even though I stay far in ghaziabad, I really want to see her and just her .
The doctor was very professional and kind. Treated me well. I am satisfied with my treatment. Highly recommended.
Well behaved, good listener and gave us enough time despite there was so many patients waiting in line. She made sure that all our queries were answered and we are satisfied with answers.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: *** ** * **** **** ******. She spoke very politely and treats her patient in the most friendly manner. She is really good.
She is very friendly. Half of the problem solved after speak to her. I always get 100% satisfaction. I will recommended to every ladies to her.

Great Doctor. Good listner, Unlike others she didn't misguide us, gave the exact treatment and medicine needed, Which worked like a miracle. I would definitely recommend her, infact did already. Thanks Doc

I can’t recommend her to anybody.
reply_text: We are very surprised to hear this as apparently no one has approached us by this name in past  2 days. All emergencies are attended promptly without fail as per our protocol and there is no one by this name in emergency records. Please leave your contact details to understand your grievances better. We wish you great health always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Truly amazing experience.. already going to her since I conceived and would be surely continuing with her post delivery too. She is truly a gem of a person who makes you get rid of all your medical worries.
The way she communicates with her patients moreover she always assures her that there is possibility in everything. I will and have recommended her to many.
I have to wait in the hospital to see the doctor for 2-2.30 hours. I booked my appointment for 1 PM and reached hospital at 12:30 but my turn comes at around 3 PM.
She is very humble and explains  everything very effectively and she  gives you a positive energy to heal yourself.

She seems very experienced but is very busy. It is difficult to discuss your issues in privacy with her and to explain and discuss all the issues in details.
I feel safe in her hands. She is very experienced and extremely helpful. Even when I call her in late night for emergency she is there for me. Haven't met a doctor like her!

review: Dr mathur is very friendly with patient n humble...she give time n counsel very well..in pregnancy counseling n treatment everything is very important n she take care all of that along with  needed medicine n treatment.I had best experience with dr mathur and nulife support staff @*

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Shankuntla is a gem of a person. she explains each and everything very patiently and nicely. The best thing i like about her is the positive energy she gives to her patient.The entire staff of nulife hospital is very supportive specially sonalika and sonia.

This was my second time with Dr. Shakuntala, consulted her for my pregnancy and also conducted my elective C-Section.  It was an extremely satisfying experience, she really puts one at ease & I would say there is a personal touch in the way she deals with her patients. She is also backed by a very passionate team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Mam was very warm and friendly in listening to us and then made the patient feel comfortable enough. Patient felt like she was being treated by a mother than a doctor. And Mam's smile is a million dollar smile which makes you feel amazing . Must visit if you have any ailment related to her profile. Amazing person.

***** *** **** ** **** Listens to your every small problem and ensures her concern for the same so it makes you feel at comfort and provides a sense of realization that may be you've come to the right place and everything shall soon fall into places..

Dr. Kept her patients waiting... she's least bothered of the wait time that her patients have to go through. For her an interview was much more important than her patients... About 10 patients were waiting but madam was busy in her interview over a tea session.
Would request her if interviews are of such importance.. avoid having appointment at the same time. At least don't ask for valuable time of patients when you are not free for them.
She is very wonderful doctor... She is very dedicated and hardworking... She always pamper her patients magically... She is always available at any time during emergency...

A very comforting and positive experience. I never felt I was only one among the many patients. Instead, I always got the required attention and care. Her positive counselling is the additional bonus I get along with her expert medical advice.
As of now its very good. I hope it will remain same. I will com back after 2 weeks as doctor has suggested to us. Thanks for your kind help
Way of the talking of Dr is excellent, Dr did create relax , positive environment in starting conversation.
This experience is awesome. She made very clear understanding of each and everything. I must refer other people.
Great knowledge and great treatment. Consultation and counselling has helped us a lot. Big problem is treated in a great way. Thanks

Doctor was extremely polite, explained our problem in detail. I would recommend her to all.
She has in depth knowledge and her treatment is always effective.
Dr gives proper time to patient. She listen each and every problem and give solution to each problem. we come out of chamber with full satisfaction
Itz! Good experience we have  good experience overall pateint name shazia ......................................
Good experience. And very co operative staff. Patient name mrs. Poonam rawat .........................................
Relaxing and very comforting. The moment I entered her chamber, she put me at ease. Very patient listener.
Doctor is very good and sweet she is a helpful doctor and she is very experienced pt. Name ankita joshi consulting doctor name Dr shakuntkla Kumar.....

Amazing experience and doctor is extremely supportive!
Analyses each and every detail and gives minimum possible medication.
Dr. Is very patient and listen to all your queries.she is very polite and understand an individual requirements...........
Great consultation to patient along with treatment. I would recommend for best treatment. Thanks....................

Doctor is very caring and concerned towards patients. The promptness of the response even at odd hours of 2:00 am is very heart warming. The ethical standards of the hospital are also very high.

Sudha
It was very good experience with doctor, she is very friendly nature and also a helpling and very good staff and good hospital
This is the 2nd time we are consulting with Dr. Shakuntala, and we are very happy with the the consultation, guidance and diagnosis we got here. Thank you Dr. Shakuntala.
It was great. As I have been coming here since eleven years . my both kids born hear . I feel very comfortable here. It's very satisfactory hospital for me and my family too

Superb doctor
Excellent and cooperative staff.
Happy to be here ......now I m in the safe hands.
It was good ,I find shakuntala mam very motivating n inspiring.I especially come here from Bhopal to meet her and I find it worth.thank u so much,but plz work on waiting time.
Good doctor. Caring environment. Friendly staff. Recommended to all would- be-mothers. Overall nice experience.
Very nice with the patient and all the queries are Superboy handled by doctor and the staff. Thanks a lot to being my doctor.
The conversation was easy.it was easy to discuss the problem and the doctor's advice was also satisfactory.
I have being hear earlier too (10 years before). I always treat this hospital & Its staff as my family.
There is no any doctor like Shakuntalata mam. She have a good nature. After met her, I feel the positive energy. She is too good.
I trust shakuntla mam with all my health issues because she explains all options and treatments very patiently!

It was the best decision of my life to continue my pregnancy with Dr.Shakuntla. She was ever-available and extremely helpful. I'll advise my family to refer her. She is the best gynecologist in Delhi!

Not only helpful but also a great motivating force in my life. Our house has been blessed with a beautiful baby because of her compassion and care. I'll most definitely recommend Dr. Shakuntla to all my family and friends!
It was absolutely very good. I m fully satisfied with my doc. Dr. Shakuntla is very active and  having friendly behaviour and I m very impressed with her.
Good and understanding, listens with patience...she is a good counselor and adviser for adolescents. I was referred by one of my relatives, I'm quite satisfied
She is very sweet and listens to all my problems patiently. I wish everyone can have a doc like shakuntla mam.
She answers every query,no matter how absurd! Waiting time might be a little extra but that is because she really spends a lot of time with every patient. I really liked her.
I have keep complete faith in mam. She has been like a guiding light in my life with her advises. She is very energetic and caring. I will recommend her to all my family and friends.
Have been her patients since 5 years and not a single time was I unsatisfied.professional, caring and compassionate.Thank you Dr.Shakuntla and Nulife!
I have never met so supportive and understanding doctor. And I'm really happy with the way doctor has dealt with my case
Dr.Shakuntla is a one stop solution to all my problems. Helped me sail through a difficult pregnancy, Highly recommended to all the women out there.
Mam is friendly and polite. She listens to your issue and gives guidelines. I would recommend her highly.
It was awful and my money got wasted. Told me to wait for a long time and gave ******* consultation. * ***** **** ****** ** ******** ****** ******
reply_text:
Very disheartening to hear that. Please let me know why you were not satisfied and what more can be done. Will resolve your issues at the earliest. If another visit is needed, we can schedule that for you on a complimentary basis.
In this time of COVID Pandemic, we are strictly following all yhe protocols and mainly attending emergencies.
